sample_docs: Don't let unproductive meetings hold you back. With Airopie, you can transform the way your teams work together. Airopie is more than just a wireless display technology solution. It's a powerful platform that lets you collaborate wirelessly and seamlessly. Whether you're in the same room or across the globe, you can share and interact with the same information on your iPhone. Airopie helps you create a positive meeting environment where everyone is on the same page and aligned with the same vision. It's not just collaboration. It's magic. Collaboration is the key to success in the modern world. Whether you're at work or at school, you need a smart and safe way to share your ideas with others. That's why Airopie created VCast, the ultimate wireless presentation system. VCast lets you connect your iPhone to any display without any apps, cables, or buttons. Just tap and go. VCast also works seamlessly with your UC device, so you can communicate with anyone, anywhere. VCast is more than a wireless display. It's a wireless revolution.

Imagine a meeting room where you can collaborate with your colleagues and clients without any hassle, delay, or distraction. This is not a dream, this is a reality with Airopie VCast Max Wireless Presentation System. We're Airopie, a dynamic and dependable group specializing in the design and manufacture of embedded vision hardware. Over the past few years, we've pioneered numerous groundbreaking innovations. Except camera hardware, Airopie supplies SDK and face liveness detection and face matching algorithm for ATM/Kiosk etc. TC5H5H-D Face Liveness Detection and Matching Dual Camera with 5MP WDR and 5MP NIR The TC5H5H-D face liveness detection camera is designed to discern whether the individual before it is indeed present in real-time, offering a robust defense against face spoofing attempts. This ensures secure biometric authentication and verification. Come with a tripod, it's ideal for unmanned counters, kiosks, and similar settings. ¥ 0.00 立即购买 TC5H5H Face Liveness Detection and Matching Dual Camera with 5MP WDR and 5MP NIR The TC5H5H face liveness detection camera identifies if the face in front of the camera belongs to the live person helping to prevent face spoofing attacks and ensuring safe biometric authentication and verification. Airopie supplies SDK, demo, manual, face liveness detection and face matching algorithm so that customers can be easily install it on ATM/Kiosk. ¥ 0.00 立即购买
